content: Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will be effective for all of your portals.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the branding subtitle that provides on-brand experience to users. It is typically displayed in a portal settings page or similar UI element, guiding users through onboarding and company information settings. Translators should consider the tone and style to maintain consistency with the brand's identity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation misses the part about the settings being effective for all portals. It focuses only on providing an on-brand experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: استخدم هذا الخيار لتوفير تجربة على العلامة التجارية للمستخدمين. ستكون هذه الإعدادات سارية المفعول على جميع بواباتك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'İstifadəçilərə brendlə bağlı təcrübə təmin etmək üçün bu seçimdən istifadə edin' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will be effective for all of your portals.'. It primarily focuses on providing a branded experience but misses the part about the settings being effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərə brendlə bağlı təcrübə yaratmaq üçün bu seçimi istifadə edin. Bu parametrlər bütün portalınız üçün keçərli olacaqdır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'брандинг преживяване' isn't the most natural or accurate rendering of 'on-brand experience'. It literally translates to 'branding experience', which doesn't fully convey the meaning.  'On-brand' implies consistency and alignment with the brand's identity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Използвайте тази опция, за да осигурите съответствие с брандинга при изживяването на потребителите.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation is missing the second part of the English content: 'These settings will be effective for all of your portals.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Използвайте тази опция, за да осигурите съответствие с брандинга при изживяването на потребителите. Тези настройки ще бъдат валидни за всички ваши портали.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation 'abyste uživatelům poskytli zážitek na úrovni značky' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users.' It focuses on 'experience on the level of the brand' instead of the broader concept of an on-brand experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tuto možnost použijte, abyste zajistili, že vaše portály budou v souladu s firemní identitou.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'These settings will be effective for all of your portals' is not adequately translated. It implies global effectivity, which may not be the intention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tyto nastavení se projeví ve všech vašich portálech.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation omits the second sentence from the English content: 'These settings will be effective for all of your portals.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verwenden Sie diese Option, um den Nutzern ein markengerechtes Erlebnis zu bieten. Diese Einstellungen gelten für alle Ihre Portale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Χρησιμοποιήστε αυτήν την επιλογή για να παρέχετε στους χρήστες εμπειρία που ταιριάζει στην επωνυμία." doesn't fully convey the meaning of the original English content. Specifically, it misses the crucial aspect that the settings will be effective for all portals. A more accurate translation would include that information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Χρησιμοποιήστε αυτήν την επιλογή για να παρέχετε στους χρήστες μια εμπειρία σύμφωνη με την επωνυμία σας. Αυτές οι ρυθμίσεις θα ισχύουν για όλες τις πύλες σας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Utilice esta opción para ofrecer una experiencia de marca a los usuarios" doesn't fully convey the meaning of the English content. It misses the key aspect of providing an 'on-brand' experience and the information about the settings being effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilice esta opción para brindar una experiencia acorde a la identidad de su marca para sus usuarios. Estos ajustes serán efectivos en todos sus portales.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation misses the part about the settings being effective for all portals. It only translates 'Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käytä tätä vaihtoehtoa tarjotaksesi käyttäjille brändikokemusta. Nämä asetukset ovat voimassa kaikissa portaaleissasi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'brändikokemusta' while technically correct, could be improved for flow and naturalness. A more natural phrasing would imply a branded experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Käytä tätä vaihtoehtoa tarjotaksesi käyttäjille yhtenäisen brändi-ilmeen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation is missing the second part of the original English content, which states that the settings will be effective for all portals. This is important context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilisez cette option pour offrir aux utilisateurs une expérience conforme à la marque. Ces paramètres seront effectifs pour tous vos portails.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Օգտագործեք այս տարբերակը՝ օգտատերերին բրենդային փորձ տրամադրելու համար:" only translates the first part of the English content. It misses the second sentence "These settings will be effective for all of your portals." The translation is incomplete.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտագործեք այս տարբերակը՝ օգտատերերին բրենդային փորձ տրամադրելու համար։ Այս գործողությունները կգործեն ձեր բոլոր պորտալների համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation is missing the second part of the English content: "These settings will be effective for all of your portals." This information is important for context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizza questa opzione per offrire agli utenti un’esperienza on-brand. Queste impostazioni saranno efficaci per tutti i tuoi portali.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'on-brand' is understandable, it might be more natural to use a more direct Italian equivalent or explanation for a broader audience. Directly translating 'on-brand' isn't common in Italian professional contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizza questa opzione per offrire agli utenti un'esperienza coerente con la tua immagine aziendale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "on-brand experience" is not directly equivalent to a single Japanese phrase. While "オンブランドのエクスペリエンス" (on-brand experience) is used, it's a transliteration and might not be the most natural way to express the intended meaning. A more idiomatic translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like:  "ブランドイメージに沿った体験を提供できます" (You can provide an experience aligned with your brand image) or  "ブランドに合った体験を提供できます" (You can provide an experience that matches your brand).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions that the settings will be effective for all portals. This information is absent in the Japanese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a clause indicating the settings' scope, such as:  "すべてのポータルに適用されます" (Applies to all portals).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "사용자에게 브랜드 경험을 제공하려면 이 옵션을 사용하세요." translates to "Use this option to provide a brand experience to your users." It misses the crucial part about the settings being effective for all portals, as stated in the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자에게 브랜드 경험을 제공하려면 이 옵션을 사용하세요. 이 설정은 모든 포털에 적용됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອສະໜອງປະສົບການໃນຍີ່ຫໍ້ໃຫ້ກັບຜູ້ໃຊ້." doesn't fully capture the meaning of the English content. It translates to 'Use this option to provide a brand experience to users.' The English original states that these settings will be effective for *all* portals, which is missing in the Lao translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ຕົວເລືອກນີ້ເພື່ອໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ໄດ້ຮັບປະສົບການທີ່ເໝາະສົງກັບຍີ່ຫໍ້ຂອງທ່ານ ຕົວແບບການຕັ້ງຄ່າເຫຼົ່ານີ້ຈະມີຜົນສັກສິດຕໍ່ບັນດາເວັບໄຊ້ທັງໝົດຂອງທ່ານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation "Izmantojiet šo opciju, lai lietotājiem nodrošinātu zīmola lietošanas pieredzi" doesn't fully convey the meaning of "Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will be effective for all of your portals." It misses the part about the settings being effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izmantojiet šo opciju, lai nodrošinātu lietotājiem atbilstošu zīmola pieredzi. Šie iestatījumi būs spēkā visos jūsu portālos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation is missing the second part of the English content: 'These settings will be effective for all of your portals.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gebruik deze optie om gebruikers een on-brand ervaring te bieden. Deze instellingen zijn van kracht voor al uw portals.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation "Użyj tej opcji, aby zapewnić użytkownikom doświadczenie marki." is a partial translation. It misses the important context that the settings are effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Użyj tej opcji, aby zapewnić użytkownikom spójne doświadczenie marki. Te ustawienia będą obowiązywać dla wszystkich Twoich portali.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Utilize esta opção para fornecer uma experiência de marca aos utilizadores." doesn't fully capture the meaning of the English content. It's missing the detail about the settings being effective for all portals and the explicit mention of providing an 'on-brand' experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilize esta opção para proporcionar uma experiência alinhada à sua marca para os utilizadores. Estas configurações serão aplicadas a todos os seus portais.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'aos utilizadores' could be improved. A more natural phrasing would depend on the overall tone of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: para os utilizadores

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'on-brand' is not naturally translated in Portuguese. While technically understandable, it's not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use esta opção para proporcionar uma experiência alinhada com a sua marca para seus usuários.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content mentions that the settings will be effective for all portals. This information is missing from the Portuguese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use esta opção para proporcionar uma experiência alinhada com a sua marca para seus usuários. Essas configurações serão aplicadas a todos os seus portais.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Utilizaţi această opţiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor o experienţă de creştere a implicării şi de conştientizare a mărcii" doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of the English content. It focuses on 'increasing engagement and brand awareness' which isn't the primary focus of the original. The original emphasizes providing an 'on-brand experience'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizați această opțiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor o experiență conformă cu imaginea mărcii dumneavoastră. Aceste setări vor fi aplicabile tuturor portalurilor dumneavoastră.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses the formal 'Utilizaţi' instead of the less formal 'Utilizează'. While both are acceptable, the former might feel overly stiff depending on the target audience and brand voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizează această opțiune pentru a oferi utilizatorilor o experiență conformă cu imaginea mărcii dumneavoastră. Aceste setări vor fi aplicabile tuturor portalurilor dumneavoastră.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'чтобы предоставить пользователям возможность использовать порталы, соответствующие имиджу и идентичности вашего бренда' is a bit verbose and doesn't directly convey the meaning of 'to provide on-brand experience'. It adds an unnecessary layer of complexity by mentioning 'the possibility to use portals'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Используйте эту опцию, чтобы обеспечить пользователям единообразный брендированный опыт. Эти настройки будут действовать для всех ваших порталов.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'имиджу и идентичности' is overly literal. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Russian when talking about branding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggested correction above replaces this phrase with 'единообразный брендированный опыт' which is more fluent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'These settings will be effective for all of your portals.' The current translation implies the option itself is effective, not the settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඔබගේ සන්නාමයේ අත්දැකීම ලබා දීමට මෙම විකල්පය භාවිතා කරන්න. මෙම සැකසුම් ඔබගේ සියලුම ඊළිportal සඳහා වලංගු වනුයේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'portal' is not correctly translated or transliterated. While 'portal' is becoming increasingly common in Sinhala, a more standard translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඔබගේ සන්නාමයේ අත්දැකීම ලබා දීමට මෙම විකල්පය භාවිතා කරන්න. මෙම සැකසුම් ඔබගේ සියලුම වෙබ්අඩවි සඳහා වලංගු වනුයේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Toto nastavenie použite, ak chcete používateľom poskytnúť zážitok zo značky' doesn't fully convey the meaning of the English content. It's a literal translation but misses the part about the settings being effective for all portals. It also lacks the 'Use this option' instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toto nastavenie použite na vytvorenie jednotného vzhľadu značky pre vašich používateľov. Tieto nastavenia sa aplikujú na všetky vaše portály.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation does not mention that these settings are effective for all portals, which is crucial information in the original English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a phrase indicating that the settings apply to all portals, e.g., 'Tieto nastavenia platia pre všetky vaše portály.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation misses the latter half of the English content, which explains the scope of the settings (effective for all portals). It also doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'on-brand experience'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabite to možnost, da uporabnikom zagotovite izkušnjo, ki je v skladu z vašo blagovno znamko. Te nastavitve veljajo za vse vaše portale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation misses the latter half of the English content. It doesn't mention that the settings will be effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Користите ову опцију да бисте корисницима пружили искуство са брендом. Ове поставке биће ефикасне за све ваше портале.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Koristite ovu opciju da biste korisnicima pružili iskustvo sa brendom." is incomplete. It doesn't convey the full meaning of the English content, specifically the part about the settings being effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite ovu opciju da biste korisnicima pružili iskustvo sa brendom. Ove podešavanja biće na snazi za sve vaše portale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Kullanıcılara markayla ilgili deneyim sağlamak için bu seçeneği kullanın' doesn't fully convey the meaning of the English sentence 'Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users. These settings will be effective for all of your portals.' Specifically, it's missing the information about the settings being effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcılara markayla ilgili deneyim sağlamak için bu seçeneği kullanın. Bu ayarlarınız tüm portalınızda geçerli olacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Використовуйте цей параметр, щоб продемонструвати користувачам ваш бренд' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Use this option to provide on-brand experience to your users.' It focuses on 'demonstrating' the brand rather than providing a consistent, on-brand user experience. The original sentence emphasizes the impact on the portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Використовуйте цей параметр, щоб створити узгоджений досвід користувачів відповідно до вашого бренду. Ці налаштування впливатимуть на всі ваші портали.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translated text is missing the reference to the settings being effective for all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Додайте фразу 'Ці налаштування будуть застосовані до всіх ваших порталів' або аналогічну.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'on-brand experience' isn't directly equivalent to anything in the Vietnamese translation. It implies aligning with a company's brand identity. The current translation lacks this nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng tùy chọn này để cung cấp trải nghiệm phù hợp với thương hiệu của bạn cho người dùng.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English sentence 'These settings will be effective for all of your portals' is missing from the Vietnamese translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng tùy chọn này để cung cấp trải nghiệm phù hợp với thương hiệu của bạn cho người dùng. Các cài đặt này sẽ có hiệu lực cho tất cả các cổng thông tin của bạn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "为用户提供更好的品牌体验" doesn't fully convey the meaning of the English content. It translates to 'Provide a better brand experience for users' which is a simplification. The English content emphasizes providing an *on-brand* experience and highlights the global impact of these settings across all portals.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 为用户提供一致的品牌体验，这些设置将应用于您的所有门户网站。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the detail about the settings' impact across all portals. This is a crucial element of the original English text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: （See suggestion above - inclusion of '这些设置将应用于您的所有门户网站'）
